titleStmt.title: [A cruel Cornish murder] ... to the tune of The ladies daughter / M.P.
titleStmt.author: M. P. (Martin Parker), d. 1656?

notesStmt.note: Title and date of publication from STC (2nd ed.).
Imprint and author's initials, M.P. appear at end of right half of sheet.
Imperfect: cut in two, severely cropped, with loss of title and text, stained, and with print show-through.
Reproduction of original in: Pepys Library.
